name: A Drop of Slime
description:
Created in 9 hours for a jam.

Bounce your slime around by dragging the bricks with the cursor, jump on other creatures, and try to top your scores of Slimepoints and Slimetime.

More obstacle types arrive as time goes up, as well as enemy health and speed. However, the more Slimepoints you have, the harder you hit, so be sure to squish those green slimes!

Have fun, and be sure to comment with your hiscores.
